base.app.title: Listly
page.home.title: Enter a list of items to compare
page.home.subtitle: Either comma separated or new line separated list of items to compare
page.home.modal.title: Clear List
page.home.modal.text: Are you sure you want to clear the list?
page.compare.title: Compare
page.compare.description: You will be presented with two items to compare from the list you entered until all items are compared. Please select the item you prefer.
page.compare.start.title: Choose between the following items
page.compare.done.title: You have compared all items. Click the button below to see the ranking.
page.compare.empty: No items to compare. Please enter a list of items.
page.compare.tooltip: If enabled, some choices will be automatically made for you depending on previously played rounds. For example, if A beats B and B beats C, then A will automatically beat C.
page.rank.title: Rank
page.rank.table.title: Title
page.rank.empty: No items to rank. Please enter a list of items to compare.
